data.title: RTTP: Motorstorm... This game has no right being this fun
data.meta_description: Going back to a game from 2006/2007 and still being somewhat blown away by how fun and distinct every single vehicle type feels is just... How the hell was...
data.text:
Firmus_Anguis

AVALANCHE

Oct 30, 2017

6,585

Jan 4, 2023

#1

Going back to a game from 2006/2007 and still being somewhat blown away by how fun and distinct every single vehicle type feels is just... How the hell was this (almost) a goddamn launch game?

Sure, it's sparse on content, I can no longer play online etc., but the level design and distinct advantages/disadvantages of every vehichle type is just so goddamn good and balanced, even to this day!

Heck, even the DualShock 3 works fine with it, didn't even have to switch to modern controllers.

It drives me nuts just thinking about what Evolution could've achieved on PS5, but... That'll sadly never happen.

I can't help but wonder how close we would've gotten to the original vision in that initial CG-trailer. It's also sad that we'll never see any remastered 4K/60 version of the original game either... This goes for Driveclub as well (which still looks amazing, BTW).
